about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure with a mischievous pig.

STORY:

In the game you play as the pig Bacon, a character left to self interpretation.
The human world is no more. Bacon resides in a temple trying to achieve some spiritual growth.
The peace is disturbed by the outside world and Bacon leaves on a quest to return the "Sunshine" island pig community to their previous state of life.
Going against the world and an attempt to challenge the Dragon leads Bacon to injury.
Once he recovers the world has already moved on but there is still faith in Bacon to reach a state of peace and enlightenment.

GAME FEATURES:

A nonlinear pixelart platformer with metroidvania elements. Jump on enemies to collect gems for which to buy items in shop or run trough and collect level progression items to reach and defeat 6 of the game bosses. Read pig npc dialogues and books for clues and find the final exit. Make Combo jumps for higher score.



Your feedback and comments would help to improve the game.

Thanks for your support!
